title: The Writer's Almanac for Tuesday, March 22, 2022
description: “While the novelist is banging on his typewriter, the poet is watching a fly in the window pane.” – poet Billy Collins, born on this day in  1941.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “While the novelist is banging on his typewriter, the poet is watching a fly in the window pane.” – poet Billy Collins, born on this day in  1941.
